description:
Kazuma is up against Koala, and the theme is to make an “animal” bread. Can Kazuma stand up against the powerful, mysterious Koala? Or will Koala secure victory for Mizuno?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Green Miracle!! Kazuma the Magician!
Le miracle vert ! Kazuma le magicien !
Midori no Kiseki!! Mahou Tsukai Kazuma!
ปาฎิหารย์สีเขียว ! จอมเวทย์คาสึมะ!
ミドリの奇跡!! 魔法使い和馬ッ!
